filetype.name: MAT File
filetype.description: Matrix describing transformation of image into standard space (found by first_flirt).

filetype.name: MAT File
filetype.description: Matrix describing transformation of image into standard space (found by first_flirt).

module.name: Label Image Validation
module.description: Takes two label images and compares the corresponding labels between the two images using Jaccard, Dice, Sensitivity, Specificity, hausdorff distance, and volume metrics. The results are displayed in that order in the ouput matrix MATLAB file. Each row containes the corresponding metric information for a particular label number. The final row contains the average over all the labels.

input.name: MATLAB Library Location
input.description: This is the MATLAB location for the executables that is used by the executable.

output.name: Metric Results File Name
output.description: The MATLAB file name that will contain the matrix of the metric values.

input.name: Number of Labels
input.description: Number of labels in the two images. Both images must have the same number of labels and they must start from being numbered at 1 to N (N being the total number of labels).

module.name: ART Transform
module.description: Uses the deformations from the ART nonlinear registration aglorithm to transform an image.

input.name: Target Image Name
input.description: This is the input image that is being transformed using the deformation file.

output.name: Transformed Image Name
output.description: This is the name of the transformed image name.

input.name: Nearest Neighbor Interpolation
input.description: Specify if nearest neighbor interpolation is required. If this is not specified then there will be linear interpolation.

module.name: ART
module.description: Nonlinear registration of two NIFTI images.

input.name: Target Image Name
input.description: This is the registration target or reference image image.

input.name: Subject Image Name
input.description: This is the registration subject image.

output.name: Transformed Subject Image Name
output.description: This is the location of the transformed subject image.

output.name: Deformation File Name
output.description: This is the name for the deformation file from the registration. Its size can be large.

module.name: Segmentation Projection
module.description: Take the pca model generated from the segmenation training module and a subject image and uses that to output template label and intensity images.

input.name: PCA Model Name
input.description: This is the name of the PCA model, it is of the MATLAB format.

input.name: MATLAB Library Location
input.description: This is the MATLAB location for the executables that is used by the executable.

input.name: Subject Image Name
input.description: This is the name of the subject image that has been registered to the mean image of the training data.

output.name: Template Intensity Image Name
output.description: This is the name of the template intensity image that is saved in the specified location.

output.name: Template Label Image Name
output.description: This is the name of the template label image that is saved in the specified location.

module.name: copy
module.description: Copy files in a read only directory into another directory where they can be edited.

module.name: copy
module.description: Copy files in a read only directory into another directory where they can be edited.

module.name: ART
module.description: Nonlinear registration of two NIFTI images.

input.name: Target Image Name
input.description: This is the registration target or reference image image.

input.name: Subject Image Name
input.description: This is the registration subject image.

output.name: Transformed Subject Image Name
output.description: This is the location of the transformed subject image.

output.name: Deformation File Name
output.description: This is the name for the deformation file from the registration. Its size can be large.

module.name: Segmentation Training
module.description: Takes a set of images 1...N names as i.intensity.nii.gz in the NIFTI zipped format and their corresponding label images 1...N names as i.label.nii.gz where i is the number of the image. Each label has L different labels numbered 1...L.

input.name: Training Images Directory
input.description: This is the directory of the training images. Make sure that it ends with "/"

output.name: PCA Model File Name
output.description: The filename for the PCA image model.

input.name: Number of Training Images
input.description: This is the number of training images used in the program.

input.name: Number of Labels
input.description: This is the number of labels that are used in the program.

output.name: Output Mean Image Name
output.description: This the name of the output mean image from the training data.

input.name: MATLAB Library Location
input.description: This is the MATLAB location for the executables that is used by the executable.

annotation.name: Compare the gold standard labels of the subject image with the ones obtained from the PCA Registration method and oputput the resulting measures into a MATLAB file.
